fields.name: Raise Flag:
fields.value: ** Target a player. Learn their corresponding Gender (See: Role 256).

fields.name: Halfmast (2x):
fields.value: ** This ability can only be used the round after a town role dies. All attacks have their attack score halved this round.

fields.name: Sew Another:
fields.value: ** Gain a random ability from a different player with the same gender as you.
